attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian nationals to apply for a UK visa
attributes.additional_details: As part of our national duty to help the people of Ukraine in a time of need.
attributes.background: Allow Ukrainians the right to seek refuge in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434
